summary: Frontend UI/UX enhancements testing - Loading skeletons, responsive design (375px mobile), collapsible sidebar, and mobile bottom navigation. All features working correctly.
critical_code_review_comments: Loading skeletons implemented correctly in DashboardPage.js, NewsDetailPage.js, SearchPage.js, BookmarksPage.js
Responsive design working at 375px mobile viewport - proper font scaling and layout adjustments
Collapsible sidebar toggles between 208px (expanded with labels) and 64px (collapsed with icons only)
Mobile bottom navigation shows 6 items: FEED, BRIEFING, SAVED, VOICES, SEARCH, MORE
Desktop sidebar and telemetry sidebar correctly hidden on mobile viewports
All data-testid attributes present for testing

context_for_next_testing_agent: UI/UX enhancements fully tested. Key features verified: (1) Loading skeletons - FeaturedSkeleton, StreamCardSkeleton, ArticleSkeleton, ListSkeleton components animate correctly during data fetch. (2) Responsive design - Mobile viewport (375px) shows proper font scaling (text-[10px] to text-xs), bottom navigation bar, hidden sidebars. (3) Collapsible sidebar - Toggle button in header collapses sidebar from 208px to 64px, shows only icons when collapsed. (4) Mobile bottom navigation - 6 nav items work correctly for page navigation.
